steps.notes: Cast main frame, base, and supports
Weld frame components
Machine mating surfaces and platen interfaces
Assemble press unit from frame, hydraulic components, and control panels
Install hydraulic pump, hoses, manifolds, and controls
Install electrical controls, interlocks, and sensors

recipe_def.notes: Basic forging press manufacturing recipe; components and BOM to be expanded.
recipe_def.name: Recipe for forging press v0

steps.notes: Mine mare regolith from surface
Screen and separate size fractions
Crush and grind coarse regolith to powder
Extract oxygen and produce metal byproduct via MRE

recipe_def.assumptions: Co-product metal alloy from MRE; refining not modeled.

steps.notes: Cast steel platen blanks for medium platen set
Machine platen surfaces parallel and flat; drill mounting holes
Finish grind to tight flatness and parallelism

recipe_def.assumptions: Hardened steel platens machined flat and parallel. Upper and lower platen set for medium press.
recipe_def.notes: Medium press platen set; designed for uniform pressure distribution across platens.
